main.value:
{
    "caption": "Organization logo (SVG)",
    "name": "organization_logo_svg",
    "description": "You'll likely get the best (sharpest) results when uploading an SVG. Try to keep the aspect ratio around 16:9 for best results.",
    "type": "file",
    "category": "Org. - Presentation",
    "sortOrder": "1",
    "templates": [
        "@@templates_client"
    ]
}

{
    "caption": "Organization sector",
    "name": "organization_sector",
    "description": "What type of organization is this?",
    "type": "listbox",
    "category": "Org. - Information",
    "sortOrder": "5",
    "inputOptionValues": "Public (government)==public||Private business==private||Non-profit organization==community",
    "templates": [
        "@@templates_client"
    ]
}

{
    "caption": "Organization industry",
    "name": "organization_industry",
    "description": "In what field is this organization active?",
    "type": "text",
    "category": "Org. - Information",
    "sortOrder": "6",
    "templates": [
        "@@templates_client"
    ]
}

{
    "caption": "Organization size",
    "name": "organization_size",
    "description": "How many employees does this organization have?",
    "type": "number",
    "category": "Org. - Information",
    "sortOrder": "10",
    "templates": [
        "@@templates_client"
    ]
}
